name: scrutable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be understood or discovered by careful examination: The company is one of this country's most successful but least scrutable organizations. Your calculations should be completely scrutable, so that another researcher can reproduce your results.
More examplesFewer examplesThe country remains less than fully scrutable.We need to decide whether or not these claims are scrutable.We describe a website as scrutable if the learner can explore it easily and find answers to their questions.The questionnaire should be transparent and scrutable for users.
